name: Riduckulous Pirates!
description:
A local duck named Stevie sends The Captain on a quest to find her missing children scattered around the land of shellwater Bay.  She promises to reward them, for their troubles.

Can The Captain sail the land in search of the missing ducklings and find the buried treasure?

Made for MOUSE MOUSE MOUSE JAM 2021

Game Design, Narrative, Music: Anna

Game Design, Level Design & art: Megan

Code, Design & Art : Robin
